```{=html}
<script type="text/babel">
 const ProfilePage = () => {
  const { useState, useEffect } = React;
  const [redirectCounter, setRedirectCounter] = useState(4);
  const [isRedirecting, setIsRedirecting] = useState(false);

  const isFrench = document.documentElement.lang === "fr";

  const translations = {
    noAccess: isFrench 
      ? "Vous n'avez pas accès à cette page."
      : "You don't have access to this page.",
    subscribe: isFrench
      ? "Veuillez vous abonner pour obtenir l'accès."
      : "Please subscribe to gain access.",
    redirecting: isFrench
      ? `Redirection vers la page d'abonnement dans ${redirectCounter} secondes...`
      : `Redirecting to subscription page in ${redirectCounter} seconds...`
  };

  const refreshToken = async () => {
    const storedRefreshToken = localStorage.getItem("refreshToken");

    if (!storedRefreshToken) {
      window.location.href = "/login.html";
      return null;
    }

    try {
      const response = await fetch("https://frenchwithkunal-cdf6ea3f88ce.herokuapp.com/api/v1/auth/refresh-token", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: {
          "Content-Type": "application/json",
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({ refreshToken: storedRefreshToken }),
      });

      if (!response.ok) {
        localStorage.removeItem("accessToken");
        localStorage.removeItem("refreshToken");
        window.location.href = "/login.html";
        return null;
      }

      const data = await response.json();
      localStorage.setItem("accessToken", data.accessToken);
      return data.accessToken;
    } catch (error) {
      localStorage.removeItem("accessToken");
      localStorage.removeItem("refreshToken");
      window.location.href = "/login.html";
      return null;
    }
  };

  const fetchWithAuth = async (url, options = {}) => {
    let accessToken = localStorage.getItem("accessToken");

    options.headers = {
      ...options.headers,
      Authorization: `Bearer ${accessToken}`,
      "Content-Type": "application/json",
    };

    let response = await fetch(url, options);

    if (response.status === 401) {
      console.log("Access token expired, attempting to refresh...");

      // Refresh token
      accessToken = await refreshToken();

      if (!accessToken) return null;

      options.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${accessToken}`;
      response = await fetch(url, options);
    }

    return response.json();
  };

  const showNoAccessMessage = () => {
    setIsRedirecting(true);
    
    const noAccessMessage = `
      <div style="text-align: center; padding: 20px;">
        <h2>${translations.noAccess}</h2>
        <p>${translations.subscribe}</p>
        <p>${translations.redirecting}</p>
      </div>
    `;
    document.body.innerHTML = noAccessMessage;
    
    // Start countdown and redirect
    const redirectInterval = setInterval(() => {
      setRedirectCounter((prev) => {
        const newCounter = prev - 1;
        if (newCounter <= 0) {
          clearInterval(redirectInterval);
          window.location.href = "https://frenchwithkunal.ca/payment.html";
        }
        
        // Update the countdown text
        const countdownElement = document.querySelector('p:last-child');
        if (countdownElement) {
          countdownElement.textContent = isFrench
            ? `Redirection vers la page d'abonnement dans ${newCounter} secondes...`
            : `Redirecting to subscription page in ${newCounter} seconds...`;
        }
        
        return newCounter;
      });
    }, 1000);
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    const storedToken = localStorage.getItem('accessToken');

    if(!storedToken) {
      showNoAccessMessage();
    } else {
      const fetchData = async() => {
        const data = await fetchWithAuth("https://frenchwithkunal-cdf6ea3f88ce.herokuapp.com/api/v1/auth/me", {
          method: "POST",
        });

        if (data && data.data && data.data.hasAccess) {
          console.log(data);
        } else {
          showNoAccessMessage();
        }
      };
      fetchData();
    }
  }, []);

  return (
    <div></div>
  );
};

ReactDOM.render(
  <ProfilePage />,
  document.getElementById('react-root')
);
 </script>
```

::: {.content-visible when-profile="english"}

The human body has many parts, each with an important function. Here are some key parts:  

- **Head (la tête):** The head contains the brain, eyes, ears, nose, and mouth. We use it to think, see, hear, smell, and eat.  
- **Eyes (les yeux):** We see with our eyes. They help us recognize colors and shapes.  
- **Ears (les oreilles):** We hear sounds with our ears. They also help us keep our balance.  
- **Nose (le nez):** We smell with our nose. It also helps us breathe.  
- **Mouth (la bouche):** We eat, drink, and speak with our mouth. Inside, we have teeth (les dents) and a tongue (la langue).  

- **Arms (les bras) and Hands (les mains):** We use our arms to carry things. Our hands have fingers (les doigts) to grab objects.  
- **Legs (les jambes) and Feet (les pieds):** We walk and run with our legs. Our feet help us stand and move.  

- **Heart (le cœur):** The heart pumps blood in the body.  
- **Lungs (les poumons):** We breathe with our lungs. They take oxygen from the air.  

Taking care of our body is important. We should eat well, exercise, and rest.  

:::

::: {.content-visible when-profile="french"}

Le corps humain a beaucoup de parties, chacune avec une fonction importante. Voici quelques parties principales :  

- **La tête :** La tête contient le cerveau, les yeux, les oreilles, le nez et la bouche. On l’utilise pour penser, voir, entendre, sentir et manger.  
- **Les yeux :** On voit avec les yeux. Ils aident à reconnaître les couleurs et les formes.  
- **Les oreilles :** On entend les sons avec les oreilles. Elles aident aussi à garder l’équilibre.  
- **Le nez :** On sent les odeurs avec le nez. Il aide aussi à respirer.  
- **La bouche :** On mange, on boit et on parle avec la bouche. À l’intérieur, il y a les dents et la langue.  

- **Les bras et les mains :** On utilise les bras pour porter des choses. Les mains ont des doigts pour attraper des objets.  
- **Les jambes et les pieds :** On marche et on court avec les jambes. Les pieds aident à se tenir debout et à bouger.  

- **Le cœur :** Le cœur pompe le sang dans le corps.  
- **Les poumons :** On respire avec les poumons. Ils prennent l’oxygène dans l’air.  


:::
